channel.title: Comments on: Wrapping tabs created by cflayout
channel.description: Web development notes and commentary from Ryan Stille

item.title: By: college essays
item.dc:creator: college essays
item.description: It worked in Firefox, but not in Opera, have you any ideas? thnks
item.content:encoded: It worked in Firefox, but not in Opera, have you any ideas? thnks

item.title: By: setare
item.dc:creator: setare
item.description: Thank you for your answer,Best wishes to you..
item.content:encoded: Thank you for your answer,Best wishes to you..

item.title: By: Ryan
item.dc:creator: Ryan
item.description:
setare you are right, its not working in IE8. I&apos;m not sure if I had some additional CSS in there when it was working in IE8 for me, or if I was just mistaken.
We&apos;ve since upgraded to CF9 and this is no longer an issue for us, so I really haven&apos;t put any more time into it.  You could use an alternate tab library (like jQuery UI or Spry) or try the EXT forums, since that is what ColdFusion is using under the hood to make the tabs.
item.content:encoded:
setare you are right, its not working in IE8. I'm not sure if I had some additional CSS in there when it was working in IE8 for me, or if I was just mistaken.

We've since upgraded to CF9 and this is no longer an issue for us, so I really haven't put any more time into it.  You could use an alternate tab library (like jQuery UI or Spry) or try the EXT forums, since that is what ColdFusion is using under the hood to make the tabs.

item.title: By: setare
item.dc:creator: setare
item.description: thanks Ryan,i checked it with IE8 But does not work:(
item.content:encoded: thanks Ryan,i checked it with IE8 But does not work:(

item.title: By: Ryan
item.dc:creator: Ryan
item.description:
setare, what version if IE is it not working in?
It will only work in IE8. I don&apos;t think its possible to make CF8 tabs wrap in IE6 7.
item.content:encoded:
setare, what version if IE is it not working in?

It will only work in IE8. I don't think its possible to make CF8 tabs wrap in IE6 7.

item.title: By: setare
item.dc:creator: setare
item.description: It worked for me in Firefox but not in IE,can you help me?
item.content:encoded: It worked for me in Firefox but not in IE,can you help me?

item.title: By: Ryan
item.dc:creator: Ryan
item.description: It works in IE8, but not 6 or 7.  I don&apos;t think its possible to make the CF8 (and 9?) tabs wrap in IE 6 or 7.
item.content:encoded: It works in IE8, but not 6 or 7.  I don't think its possible to make the CF8 (and 9?) tabs wrap in IE 6 or 7.

item.title: By: Deborah

item.description: this only worked for me in Firefox. It does not wrap in IE.
item.content:encoded: this only worked for me in Firefox. It does not wrap in IE.
